name: Drone Defender (mkhoi)
description:
This game is made for LOWREZJAM 2022

The nation of Golista is sending spy drones to steal our intel! Failure to stop them will result in an invasion. Our country is too weak to fight against such a nation. But we can fight against their drones! Use your big gun!

The Golistans have many drones. The red ones are just basic drones. Green ones can hack your gun and gives you debuffs. The blue ones can steal intel twice as fast. And finally, the purple ones, they generate a shield which blocks all of your attacks, but because of that, they can't steal your intel. When the bars under the drones fill up, they will fly away along with a part of our intel, which is the grey bar at the top. If the grey bar becomes empty, the Golistans will have enough intel to launch an invasion.

Your gun is our best weapon against these drones. It has many attacks. "Bullet" attack shoots a bullet, weak but fast. "Bomb" attack shoots out a bomb, stronger but can't hit drones at higher altitudes, harder to control and bounces the drones around. The final attack is the "Zap", it shoots out a beam of lighting, stopping the drones from taking intel for a small amount of time, it does little damage and is very slow.

Also, after each day, you can upgrade your gun!

That's it for your briefing. Good luck out there! You're our last hope.

Controls:

  • Left/Right arrow keys: Rotate gun
  • Space: Shoot
  • Z/X: Change attack
